name: AirHelp
headline: AirHelp helps air passengers get compensation for delayed, cancelledâ¦
description:
We help get compensation for air passengers that have experienced delayed, cancelled, and overbooked flights. We make the claim process much faster, easier and less painfull because the airlines won't.

We love new challenges! As a start-up, weâve been through it all and thanks to this our AirHelpers have developed the skills to deal with it all, and more, all while remaining passionate about what we do â helping ordinary people â as flight delays can happen to anyone.

What helps us continuously develop, is our combination of talent, passion and persistance.

What makes us different?
Every single one of our employees can make an impact on the future of AirHelp â come up with an innovative idea â and weâll help you implement it at AirHelp. This is an experience you can gain in very few places! 
If youâre looking to develop new skills, make an impact on not only global business, but ordinary, everyday travellers, and take risks developing and implementing new projects â what are you waiting for? Come join us today!

With a variety of departments to choose from: tech, product, legal, finance, human resources, customer service (and the list goes on!) - you donât have to narrow your horizons, just take your pick. Pick what youâve got a knack for, and most importantly, what you enjoy!

AirHelp. We're here to help!

founders.name: Henrik Zillmer, Founder
founders.description: Henrik Zillmer is a serial entrepreneur, former Rocket Internet executive and founder of AirHelp and ROOM to mention a few. Henrik has founded more than ten startupsâ within insurance, travel, software and e-commerce. At Rocket Internet Henrik launched one of Asiaâs largest e-commerce businesses Zalora in eight different countries and took the company from 5 to 2,000 employees in less than one year. Henrik is currently chairman of AirHelp and continues to be active in Y Combinator as an advisor.

# Did you have a delayed or canceled flight?
Get up to **$650 compensation** per passenger, no matter the ticket price. No win, no fee!
Departure airport
Final destination airport
[Check Compensation](http://www.airhelp.com/<https:/funnel.airhelp.com/claims/new?lang=en&departureAirportIata=&arrivalAirportIata=> "Check Compensation")
or
[Fast check with boarding pass](http://www.airhelp.com/<https:/funnel.airhelp.com/claims/barcode/uploader?lang=en>)
All airlines
All countries
No Win, No Fee
![friends](https://img.airhelp.com/i/homepage/fellow-claiming-left.png)
##### Get friends, kids or colleagues compensation too
Each person you traveled with could also be owed up to $650! Just mention them in your claim.
![](https://img.airhelp.com/i/homepage/fellow-claiming-right.png)

[](http://www.airhelp.com/<https:/www.airhelp.com/en/airhelp-plus/> "AirHelp+")
Why choose AirHelp? 
## We solve more flight problems
As the world’s largest flight compensation company, we work across more countries, and can help in more situations than anyone else.
#### Canceled flights
Flight canceled with little notice? You could be entitled to up to $650 compensation on top of your refund.
#### Flight delays
#### Missed connections
#### Uncooperative airlines
no win, no fee
## You get paid, we get paid
Our fee is deducted from the compensation we win for you. That means nothing ever comes out of your pocket and you’ve got nothing to lose. Our standard fee is 35% and includes VAT so there are no surprises later. [See our fees](http://www.airhelp.com/</en/our-fees/>)
[Check Compensation](http://www.airhelp.com/<https:/funnel.airhelp.com/claims/new?lang=en>)
![no win, no fee](https://img.airhelp.com/i/homepage/No-win-no-fee-formal-desktop.png)
## We’re the world’s largest air passenger rights organization, here to help passengers since 2013.
### 2.7 M
We’ve helped 2.7 million passengers receive their compensation.
### 400+
Dedicated support from our team of over 400 professionals.
### 50+
Our network of law firms spans over 35 countries and jurisdictions.
### 19
We can help in 19 languages. 
[Explore AirHelp+](http://www.airhelp.com/</en/airhelp-plus/>)
€100 when your flight’s disrupted
€100 for a lost or delayed bag
Lounge access during a disruption
No fees deducted from your compensation
Dedicated 24/7 support

generated_description:
AirHelp, founded in 2013 and a proud member of the Y Combinator W14 batch, has emerged as the go-to solution for air passengers seeking compensation for delayed, canceled, or overbooked flights. What sets AirHelp apart? Simple: they make the compensation process faster, easier, and less painful for travelers—something most airlines often neglect.

Their mission is straightforward: to help ordinary people reclaim what they deserve when things go wrong with their flights. With flight delays an everyday reality for many, AirHelp thrives on tackling these challenges head-on, utilizing a potent mix of talent, passion, and persistence. In fact, every AirHelper is empowered to propose and implement innovative ideas that could shape the company’s future—a unique opportunity in the startup realm.

With a team of around 350 employees and expertise spanning various departments like tech, product, legal, and customer service, AirHelp is not just another company; it’s a learning ground. Whether your skills lie in coding or customer outreach, there’s a niche for you here.

Now, let’s talk numbers. AirHelp has facilitated compensation for over 2.7 million passengers, checked more than 180 million flights, and accumulated a stellar 167,000+ five-star reviews from satisfied customers. They operate under regulations such as the EU Regulation EC 261 and the Montreal Convention, ensuring travelers know their rights.

The process is simple: passengers can claim up to $650 without any upfront fees—AirHelp only takes a percentage from the compensation when successful. This no-win, no-fee model means there’s essentially nothing to lose for travelers.

If you’re looking for a place where you can make an impact on a global scale while helping everyday people navigate the complexities of air travel, look no further. AirHelp is here to revolutionize air passenger rights, one claim at a time. Interested? Check them out at [AirHelp.com](http://www.airhelp.com) and seize that opportunity to change the travel experience for the better.
